languages.text:
Medium-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 3 shots, dealing 14 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.
Whenever it hits an enemy ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}, it has a 50% chance to start {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} on that ship for <u>(from 3 to 4)</u> rounds.

Each shot wich hit target hull has 50% chances to start {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} for 3-4 rounds.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}Башенные{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}макропушки{/g} средней дальности с 3 зарядами, наносящими по 14 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
При попадании в корпус в нем начинается {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}внутренний пожар{/g} с вероятностью 50%, который длится <u>(от 3 до 4)</u> раундов.

languages.text:
Mittelstrecken-{g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}Dorsal{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Makrokanonen{/g}, die 3 Schüsse abfeuern und pro Schuss 14 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} verursachen.
Wird der {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpf{/g} eines feindlichen Schiffs getroffen, besteht eine Chance von 50 %, dass auf dem Schiff <u>(3 bis 4)</u> Runden lang {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}interne Feuer{/g} ausbrechen.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Macro-canons{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsaux{/g} moyenne portée tirant 3 coups et infligeant 14 points de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} par coup.
Chaque fois qu'un projectile touche la {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}coque{/g} d'un vaisseau ennemi, il a 50 % de chances de déclencher des {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}incendies internes{/g} pendant <u>(3 à 4)</u> rounds.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Macrocañones{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsales{/g} de medio alcance que disparan 3 veces, infligiendo 14 de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} por disparo.
Cada vez que impactan en el {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}casco{/g} de una nave enemiga, tienen una probabilidad del 50 % de provocar un {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}incendio interno{/g} en la nave durante <u>(de 3 a 4)</u> asaltos.
languages.original_text:
Medium-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 3 shots, dealing 14 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.
Whenever it hits an enemy ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}, it has a 50% chance to start {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} on that ship for <u>(from 3 to 4)</u> rounds.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Macrocañones{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsales{/g} de medio alcance que disparan 3 veces, infligiendo 14 de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} por disparo.
Cada vez que impactan en el {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}casco{/g} de una nave enemiga, tienen una probabilidad del 50 % de provocar un {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}incendio interno{/g} en la nave durante <u>(de 3 a 4)</u> asaltos.

languages.text:
中距離の{g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}背部{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}マクロキャノン{/g}。3発発射し、それぞれが14{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
敵艦の{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体{/g}に命中するたびに、50%の確率で<u>(3～4)</u>ラウンドの間、その艦に{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}船内火災{/g}を引き起こす。
languages.original_text:
Medium-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 3 shots, dealing 14 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.
Whenever it hits an enemy ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}, it has a 50% chance to start {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} on that ship for <u>(from 3 to 4)</u> rounds.

traits.locale_text:
中距離の{g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}背部{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}マクロキャノン{/g}。3発発射し、それぞれが14{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
敵艦の{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体{/g}に命中するたびに、50%の確率で<u>(3～4)</u>ラウンドの間、その艦に{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}船内火災{/g}を引き起こす。

languages.text:
这种中程{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}宏炮{/g}组安装在{g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}船脊{/g}，可发射3枚炮弹，每枚炮弹可造成14点{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
每当这种武器命中敌舰{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体{/g}时，都会有50%的几率在敌舰引发{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}内部火灾{/g}，效果持续<u>三到四轮</u>。

每当这种武器命中敌舰{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体{/g}时，都会有50%的几率在敌舰引发{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}内部火灾{/g}，效果持续<u>三到四轮</u>。

languages.text:
Her biri 14 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}hasar{/g} veren 3 atış yapan orta menzilli, {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}sırt{/g} kısmına monte {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}makro toplar{/g}.
Bir düşman gemisinin {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}gövdesini{/g} vurduğunda %50 olasılıkla o gemide {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}iç yangınlar{/g} çıkarır. Bu yangınlar <u>(3 ila 4)</u> raunt sürer.
